forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
